# 2.0 Loading Required packages



```{r loading-packages}
packages = c('ggstatsplot', 'ggside', 
             'tidyverse', 'ggdist')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```
